oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design of geosynthetic reinforced retaining walls
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MANDAL, JN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: soil wall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, the design of geosynthetics (geogrids) reinforced retaining walls are summarized. Seismic analysis is considered for the design of geosynthetic reinforced soil retaining walls. Many designers do not have tools required to complete all of stability analysis for site conditions. Most current geosynthetics reinforced retaining soil wall design software products do not address all the components of the stability analysis. This paper is directed towards researchers, practitioners, regulators and guidance for future research and development of codes for reinforced soil walls.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: GEOSHORE INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON OFFSHORE AND NEARSHORE GEOTECHNICAL ENGINEERING,439-442
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Geoshore International Conference on Offshore and Nearshore Geotechnical Engineering,PANVEL, INDIA,DEC 02-03, 1999
